item.title: UK Approves Targeted Therapy for Cervical Cancer
item.description: The MHRA has approved tisotumab vedotin for adults with recurrent or metastatic cervical cancer, offering a new option after earlier treatment failure...

item.title: FDA OKs Blood-Based Test to Help Diagnose Prostate Cancer
item.description: Premarket approval means IsoPSA testing can now be done at certified labs nationwide. Medscape Medical News

item.title: Step Counts May Signal Early Signs of Parkinson's Disease
item.description: Low daily step counts predict Parkinson's disease years before diagnosis but are likely a sign of early disease, not a risk factor. Medscape News UK

item.title: Scoliosis Surgery Cuts Pneumonia Risk in Cerebral Palsy
